name: Computational Philosophy
body:
###Computational Morality
> Ethics is methodologically infirm because it lacks responsiveness to observation.
> Quine, W.V.O. , Theories and things, Belknap Press, 1981

Here, I investigate possible solutions to this problem.
I'll let you know if I find some good stuff.

F
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
